tool.name: blastn_to_scaffold
tool.description: Generate DNA scaffold from blastn alignment of Contigs

param.name: blastn_tab
param.label: Select a blastn output from your history
param.help: must have 13 columns with column 13 containing the subject lenght, other columns are standard

tool.help:
**What it Does** This tool start from DNA contigs that aligned to a subject protein sequence through blastn. The contigs must be provided in fasta format. The blastn output must be tabular, the 12 standard column plus column 13 with the length of the blastn subject. The final scaffold is a DNA sequence. Sequences of the subject DNA sequence which were not aligned to the contigs are replaced by Ns in this scaffold.
